labels: Oberon Sinclair ZX Spectrum SDCC tool TAP TRD
name: MakeZX
short_description:
A converter from BIN/IHX files to target TAP/TRD ZX Spectrum's images. May be used with SDCC (Small Device C Compiler).

Now it's planned. For more information, please visit http://zx.oberon2.ru/forum/viewtopic.php?f=10&t=37
summary: A converter from BIN/IHX files to target TAP/TRD ZX Spectrum's images.
